div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1895 Taranto, Calabria, 1951 Burial: c. 440 B.C. (K) Contents: 33 AR Taras: 6 st. (1 hippocamp; 5 oecist) Laus: 1 st. (double-relief) Metapontum: 10 st. (incuse) Sybaris: 2 st. Caulonia: 4 st. (double-relief) Croton: 10 st. (incuse: 9 rev. tripod; 1 eagle) Disposition: Taranto Tamburello, AIIN 1954, p. 164
